text: Beaumont is a commune. It is in Auvergne-Rh么ne-Alpes in the Puy-de-D么me department in central France. == Twin towns == Beaumont is twinned with: * Bopfingen, Germany * Russi, Italy == References == == Other websites == * Town hall website Category:Communes in Puy-de-D么me
